sentences.english: The President's envoy to the conference has not yet been chosen.
sentences.chinese: 總統的外交使節參加會議尚未被選中。

sentences.english: Invite in the local excellencies and other important foreign guests to attend.
sentences.chinese: 邀請駐在當地的各國使節和其他重要外賓參加。

sentences.english: The two ministers didn't close with each other until near the end of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位外交使節直到會議將近結束時才達成協議。

sentences.english: Space mulberry road the second diplomatic corps chief quickly make a noise to say.
sentences.chinese: 格桑路亞的使節團團長趕忙出聲說道。

sentences.english: As you know, it is well known how Qi treats missioner.
sentences.chinese: 可是你知道齊國對待使節陽奉陰違是出了名的。

sentences.english: 2008 also marked the 100 years anniversary of Danish diplomatic presence in China.
sentences.chinese: 2008年也標誌着丹麥外交使節來到中國100年。

sentences.english: Marco Polo 's travelogue mentions that Kublai Khan sent envoys to Malgache .
sentences.chinese: 馬可波羅遊記中提到忽必烈曾派使節到過馬爾加什。

sentences.english: Fifth, to further carry out the work on the team of wives of African diplomatic envoys to China.
sentences.chinese: 五是進一步開展非洲駐華使節夫人小組工作。

sentences.english: The continued heat keeled over quite a few of the summer visitors.
sentences.chinese: 持續不斷的酷熱使節些避暑旅客暈倒了。

sentences.english: A special peace envoy was sent to the area.
sentences.chinese: 她是世界著名外交使節。

sentences.english: The ambassadors also handed over agreements they hoped the czar would sign.
sentences.chinese: 使節們同時也遞上了他們希望沙皇能簽字的協議。

sentences.english: At the same time, the kings in Korea Dynasty must send the diplomatics to Beijing to contribution.
sentences.chinese: 同時，朝鮮國王須定期或不定期地派使節到北京朝貢。

sentences.english: vt. Our envoy was accredited to the new government.
sentences.chinese: 我國已向該國新政府派遣了外交使節。

sentences.english: He waged a number of wars, but all of them through his legates .
sentences.chinese: 他進行了許多戰爭，但全部都是通過他的使節們。

sentences.english: Polo 's travelogue mentions that Kublai Khan sent envoys to Malgache.
sentences.chinese: 馬可波羅遊記中提到忽必烈曾派使節到過馬爾加什。

sentences.english: Our envoy was accredited to the new government.
sentences.chinese: 我國已向該國新政府派遣了外交使節。
